summary: "Charlotte's Web" is a beloved children's book written by E.B. White and illustrated by Garth Williams. It tells the story of a pig named Wilbur and his friend, a spider named Charlotte. When Wilbur is in danger of being slaughtered, Charlotte saves him by writing amazing things about him in her web. This classic book has been a favorite since it was published in 1952. It has also been made into movies and a video game. The book is known for its beautiful writing, especially when describing swinging on a rope swing.
title: Charlotte's Web
